valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 9 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 10 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low southwest England 969 expected netherlands 985 by 1800 Friday. New low expected Rockall 999 by same time. Low Bailey 987 losing its identity
